part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excrete the calcified walls of their arcologies as beautiful fans. They have stone texture and house microlife in their cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excrete the calcified walls of their arcologies as threading spires. They have stone texture and house microlife in their cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excrete the calcified walls of their arcologies as cephalized variagations. They have stone texture and house microlife in their cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Porous skeletons of spongin poke the inverted tunnel buttes, stone-like, out to angles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excreted the calcified walls of their arcologies as beautiful fans. They have stone texture and housed microlife in their hollow cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excreted the calcified walls of their arcologies as threading spires. They have stone texture and housed microlife in their hollowed cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft-body beings excreted the calcified walls of their arcologies as cephalized variagations. They have stone texture and housed microlife in their hollowed cavities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Feldspar and its cousin rocks are composited and pocked with static-pattern grain. Cracks foreshadow the pebbles of the future.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reefs were the arcologies of the young oceans. Now they are dessicated crypts, their surfaces bitten by forgotten water into rough wounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Darkness floods up the jagged coral edges of an open pit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Darkness floods up the lava funneled edges of an open pit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its bitten iron blade stays ready to cut root and stem, and skin oil stains the straps of its long leathery haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron lines unfold into a metal orb bristling with thorns.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron lines chain down a writhing star of metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron vigorously curves along a sharpened meridian, and skin oil dampens the leather grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An elaborate contraption of gnarled wood and cold metal held together by greased strings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The horrid light of unseen ages has been entombed within this glinting fragment. It glows in a disturbing manner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fallen scale of a winged terror. It contains the essence of flame and burning death.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mass of indeterminate muck was shaped and tumbled by a cruel hand into a sphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was shaved into an enormous bludgeoning bulb.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mass of forged bronze has been shaped into a skewering implement as vast as a weaver's beam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous coat of bronze mail fit for a mighty warrior.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous shell of a great abyssal gastropod now a mighty redoubt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crudely constructed yet remarkably powerful this weapon was made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. The bowstring is waxed with a mysterious fat better left unknown.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This weapon increases the base penetration of its ammo by 5. This weapon increases the damage die of its ammo by 5. This weapon increases the damage bonus of its ammo by 2.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A weapon of elder and barbaric ages ruled by the gun as lord of death and master of fate. For all its age it is still deadly indeed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The severed foot of a rabbit. The luck of its owner has been passed on to its bearer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A lump of crude metal has been forged into a sphere of terrible destruction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A burnished bronze cannon from an age perished to ruin. Once such weapons brought empires to ruin, perhaps an echo of that glory shall echo down through time.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The torn and broken armor plating of an indomitable chitinoth. The shattered chitin is deadly sharp and crushingly heavy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of mighty chitin forged to defend the homes of insect royalty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The carapace of some mighty arthropod hollowed out for the use of insect nobility.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gauntlets of shaped chitin shaped for the needs of arthropod warriors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boots wrought of fallen chitin from some primordial insect now used as symbols of might and status.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hollowed head molt of some forgotten insect lord now worn in their honor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mess of floral pollen highly desired by insects and those who make trade with them.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wooden chest reinforced with arthropod chitin to contain their treasures.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ornately stamped and timeworn hatch now rusted into decay.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ornately stamped and timeworn exit hatch from the depths of the great machine colossus.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Provides egress from the depths of the great mechacolossus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the hip segment of the great machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the right leg of the great machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the left leg of the great machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the chest segment of the great machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the left arm of the great machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the right arm of the great machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hatch which opens into a yet deeper layer of the great machine colossus. The map upon the hatch indicates it leads to the head of the great machine. Shadows seep from the cracks in the hatch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of living metal now flagging under the weight of eternity as gears and other mechanical elements peek through break in what was once a glistening chrome lining.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arts of weapon making of the elder Saad may never be surpassed, so profound was their technology that even after all this time the great machine can forge new weapons in those remarkable designs. This is a blazing sword of ruinous might.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arts of weapon making of the elder Saad may never be surpassed, so profound was their technology that even after all this time the great machine can forge new weapons in those remarkable designs. This is a freezing sword of deadly grace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arts of weapon making of the elder Saad may never be surpassed, so profound was their technology that even after all this time the great machine can forge new weapons in those remarkable designs. This is a dashing axe of valours strength.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arts of weapon making of the elder Saad may never be surpassed, so profound was their technology that even after all this time the great machine can forge new weapons in those remarkable designs. This is a reckless pair of crushing boots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arts of weapon making of the elder Saad may never be surpassed, so profound was their technology that even after all this time the great machine can forge new weapons in those remarkable designs. This is a brutish rending claw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arts of weapon making of the elder Saad may never be surpassed, so profound was their technology that even after all this time the great machine can forge new weapons in those remarkable designs. This is an elegant hook of lithe ferocity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mechanical mask of the valiant robot warriors within the great mechacolossus.

part.Name: LifeSaver
part.LethalMessage: =subject.Name's= =object.name= =objverb:burst= apart, destroying =objpronouns.reflexive= to prevent potentially lethal damage.
part.MaxHitpointsThresholdMessage: =subject.Name's= =object.name= =objverb:burst= outward, destroying =objpronouns.reflexive= to prevent catastrophic damage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mechanical mask of the dread shadow which has haunted the depths of the great machine. Where it failed to save its owner it may yet provide help to another.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The cast off body-plating of some undersea horror. Its crenellated ridges belie its durability.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A discarded relic of the eaters which once allowed the plumbing of such terrible depths as the abyss.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fragmented plating from myriad undersea creatures forged and crafted together into a formidable set of gauntlets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shells of fallen snails have been grafted together with fish scales into boots fit for making war amidst the waves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The gnarled, timeworn half-shell of a giant clam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bivalve shell of brutal strength fit for crushing armored beasts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once mighty snails were harvested for flesh and shell for the eater nobles. Now their discarded shells are crafted into clubs for killing their kin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spider crabs crawled and migrated across the ocean depths now vanished into the west. Their vicious claws serve still as weapons among their brethren.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the farthest depths of the sea dwell creatures of horror best left unimagined. The broken armor left behind from their wars are highly coveted to be made into weapons for lesser causes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ancient sharks once hunted the oceans for prey of prodigious size. Their fossilized teeth are deadly still in the right hands or pseudopods.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Great spined lobsters once swarmed in abundance in the oceans to be feasted upon by the eaters of old. Their wars brought them low and all that is left of them are weapons and armor forged of their discarded shells.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The dreadful horn rendered from the body of a fallen limulicron.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hairy vessel filled with delicious milky flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The dismembered pincer of a pistol shrimp repurposed into a weapon for mortal use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The dismembered pincer of a once mighty lobster of the forgotten waters.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The withered remnant of an abyssal angler fish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The skin of an abyssal shark was cut to a bodysuit for sneaking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shattered core a fallen undersea sorcerer now bound to serve its destroyer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shattered core a slain star-beast filled with the power of all the lives unlived and lives stolen by the monster who once bore it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ruined armor of a slain mollusc prepared to defend a new master.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The terrible beak of a true terror of the underocean. Strength lies within to slay even the mighty titans of old.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A terrible weapon which has been the doom of many an unwary man and beast in the dark waters.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the rendered and rigored jaws of the dead ocean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the dismembered and hollowed claws of the dead ocean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the empty former home of the dead ocean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the shattered core of the dead ocean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This is a hauberk which shielded the weak flesh of the tyrants of old.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. These are the gauntlets by whose iron fists the will of the mighty was known.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. These are the boots which stamped out dissenters who sought to rise against the conquerors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This helm's terrible visage is a grim reminder of the time of its makers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This warhammer once crushed the helms of knights and peasantry alike.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This morningstar whirls a deadly dance of death, its wielder at the same terrible risk as its victim.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This wicked blade was used to end the life of armored nobles who thought their titles gave them safety.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This cruel axe shorn apart armor and flesh with ready hatred.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This great axe was used not for war but for the ending of those deemed criminal by the tyrants of old.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This cruel sword was used for duels of honor among the dishonorable nobles of that era.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This brutish blade swept aside spear and shield alike to slake the bloodthirst of its master.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark of the earth forbidden star metals were forged by the heat of magma and quenched in human blood. This bulwark cast aside blades and arrows alike to spare the life of its master.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: A strangle medley of incomprehensible flavors drawn forth from the myriad rotting things of the ancient ruins.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fleshy spore sac plundered from a fallen fungus of great power.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The extracted silk of the gargantuan spiders who dwell in the ruined city. A treasure of remarkable worth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The greatest treasure of the mighty spiders. It contains all their possible futures and the end of mortal hope.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The bleak heart of an accursed once-human now perished in flesh. Beware the promises made within.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished chitin glimmers even in dark places where it cuts through armor as easily as flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Where the mighty worms once burrowed in earth they have left behind only the tooth which can cut through stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long edge still blazes with the venom of the dread centipede from which this was shorn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The slick skin of worms has been rent into a fleshly cloak. The earth slips away in your wake.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the broken visage of the dead subterranean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the matted fur of the dead subterranean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the cloven and stitched skin boots of the dead subterranean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 to all mutation levels +6 to cybernetics license tier

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints the corded fangs of the dead subterranean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of glistening honey and dried in moonlight paints budding fragment of the dead subterranean Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Piled earth and deep grass roots form a gnarled mass heaped high.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Towering king of the old forests that once sprawled across primordial Qud. No less majestic in solitude and a crown upon the crags.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Such hardy grass truly typifies the term often used to describe stems of grass. Lesser grass cannot truly be called blades, these can assuredly be described in such terms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A clump of hardy steppe grass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A colony of lichen sprawled across a small boulder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rare spot of color in a sea of grass, the little thorny flowers flow with the breeze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carved from some ancient stone and glyphed with shattered illustrations of simian scrawlings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A blade of crude metal housed in chitin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crudely forged yet remarkably tough iron alloyed armor made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. The heavy mail stinks of death.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crudely forged yet remarkably tough iron alloyed armor made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. The crude mitts are spotted with blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crudely forged yet remarkably tough iron alloyed armor made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. The boots are hobnailed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crudely forged yet remarkably tough iron alloyed armor made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. The helm is uncomfortably large.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crudely forged yet remarkably tough iron alloyed blade made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. The sword is cruelly dull, nearly a bludgeon without great strength behind it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mass of remarkably tough pig iron alloyed in the mysterious forges of Ogmag.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crudely forged yet remarkably tough iron alloyed shield made in the fabled forges of Ogmag in the frozen north. A vile sigil lies upon its face.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The dismembered hand of a mechanical false god. Time would have eaten them eventually you have merely accelerated entropy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the shattered wreckage of a false chrome god, fragments glitter from amidst the ruin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The conquered hide of the mighty lion rendered into a pelt worthy of a champion.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The butchered fur of one of nature's marvels. Only a truly cruel person would gird themselves in such a garment.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather armlet decorated with the tusks of wild hellpigs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stolen feather of a great roc.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ripped from the fallen body of a true ape to use as a token of bloody conquest over apekind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fine leather boots made from the ironflecked hide of the mighty oryx.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The eye of an enlightened ape, even separated from its host this eye floats in psychic tranquility.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shining tusk of what was once a mighty wanderer of the north, now little more than a weighty bauble.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ribbon of bestial leather is looped around the base of a natural blade of ursine tooth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Forged from pure river bed gold and decorated with saphires. It radiates uncanny charisma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ruined head of a mighty warg now forged into a helm for war.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The butchered remnants of one of nature's mistakes. It smells odd and is sickening to look upon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A venom dripping fang of a fallen tarantula.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ancient relic of a gun older than the eaters which has served in the hands of heroes and outlaws alike since the primordial gunslingers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The bloom of a mossy mound.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It glints in the chord of non-euclidian spaces where bananas stretch forth to infinity for the grace of ape kind.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Provides entry to the dangerous depths of the simian dream space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It shimmers in the essence of the quantum uncertainty of inexplicable realities where dream meats ordinary flesh.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Provides egress from the hallucinatory depths of the simian dream space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The glistening edge of dreamspace slickens and warps at the sight. One cannot bear to think clearly in its presence as delusions and dreams burst forth from the heady mist of the primordial simian dream. From such a dream would emerge the eaters and their doom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ehh banana.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An illusory banana which beckons deep into the dreamspace.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: DO NOT USE within the dreamspace lest you be lost forever in its depths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A maddened mango which beckons into the depths of the dream.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: DO NOT USE within the dreamspace lest you be lost forever in its depths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Whether carved from some ancient stone or envisaged from raw imagination it appears before you immutable and vast. It is glyphed with detailed illustrations of simian scrawlings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Whether carved from some ancient stone or envisaged from raw imagination it appears before you immutable and vast. It is glyphed with detailed illustrations of simian scrawlings. The wall is decorated with figures of monkeys.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Whether carved from some ancient stone or envisaged from raw imagination it appears before you immutable and vast. It is glyphed with detailed illustrations of simian scrawlings. The wall is decorated with figures of stylized bananas.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Whether carved from some ancient stone or envisaged from raw imagination it appears before you immutable and vast. It is glyphed with detailed illustrations of simian scrawlings. The wall is decorated with figures of great apes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An old scroll written upon dreamworn futures. The dreams of unrevealed poets unfurled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the supple pelt of the dreamborn queen Chamba into a luxurious fur cape.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +2 to all mutation levels +12 to cybernetics license tier

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of the dreamborn king Lauwi into a heavy ushanka.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +2 to all mutation levels +12 to cybernetics license tier

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of the dreamborn king Khomga into giant-fingered gloves, and gargantuan knuckles sawed to points stick through.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: While equipped wielder may equip two handed weapons in one hand. +1 to all mutation levels +6 to cybernetics license tier.
